detail.author: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'body > div > div.row.m-0.mt-lg-3 > div.col-lg-9.px-0 > div.comic-main-section.bg-white.p-0.p-sm-3.d-sm-flex > div > ul.creators > li > a');}
detail.introduction: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'body > div > div.row.m-0.mt-lg-3 > div.col-lg-9.px-0 > div.comic-main-section.bg-white.p-0.p-sm-3.d-sm-flex > div > p');}
detail.upDate: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'body > div > div.row.m-0.mt-lg-3 > div.col-sm-12.col-lg-3.px-0 > div.default-wrapper.mt-3.mt-md-0.ml-md-3 > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(6) > td > a');}

comic.list: loadScript('https://gitee.com/yx_myacg/ACGSourceRepository/raw/master/js/base64.js');function Main(html){var array = jsonPaths(Base64.decode(strmiddle(html,'var img_data = \'','\'')),'$..img');var img_pre = jsoup(html,'div.d-none@attr->data-host')+jsoup(html,'div.d-none@attr->data-img_pre');var obj= [];for(var i =0;i<array.length;i++){obj.push(img_pre+array[i]);};return obj;}
